start.text: You are a paranormal investigator exploring a haunted mansion. You hear a strange noise coming from the basement. You can either investigate the noise or leave the mansion.

investigate.text: You find a secret passage in the basement that leads to an ancient crypt. You can either enter the crypt or go back upstairs.

leave.text: You leave the mansion and never look back. The mystery of the haunted mansion remains unsolved.

crypt.text: You enter the crypt and are confronted by a powerful ghost. You have uncovered the source of the haunting!

upstairs.text: You go back upstairs and the strange noises stop. You have failed to solve the mystery.
